::Shredder/Zardus::

Shredder raises his gun and levels it at Sinesis' face.

 "I told you to shut up! We have enough problems as it is without me having 
to kill you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus nods. "Ah. Excelent. We need trops."
